page.title: 08RECREATION HOBBIES & GAMES
page.content: I am an 11 year old girl attending Gilwern C.P. School.My hobbies are swimming,gymnastics and stamp collecting.I go to Abergavenny Swimming Club on a Monday night from 7.50_8.30 p.m.,and I enjoy it very much.I have been going to a Gym Club for about 5 years.With stamp collecting,my mum gave me a box of stamps to get me going,and I carried on from there. At school the games I play are rounders and netball.We play rounders on the school field.There are 2 teams, with an equal number of children in each.In netball,I either play Wing Attack or Centre.In netball there are 2 teams of 7 players.I have played in 'A'team matches against other schools.
